medium: Pen and black ink, brush and blue wash
title: One of Two Designs for the Decoration of a Sword Scabbard
description: drawing is on asymmetric shaped paper, wider at top, narrower at bottom; male figure at center stands with one arm around a large sword and other arm around the severed head of a large man; four men behind him wear helmets; two putti at bottom; architectural decorations around center image
